raw_body: SILVA – W.A. PREMASIRI – Formerly of the National Milk Board and H/​S E.B. Creasy & Co. Ltd.,​ the eldest son of the late Mr & Mrs W.A.J.E. Silva of Koralawella,​ Moratuwa,​ husband of Vivette,​ father of Jeyeni,​ Manjeeva and Nalinda,​ father-in-law of Ruwan Jayasinghe,​ Geethika and Darshi,​ passed away. Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella,​ Kanatte at 4.00 p.m. on Sunday the 05th November 2023. The body lies at the Jayaratne Respect Hall from 10 a.m. Saturday till 10.00 p.m. and 9.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. on Sunday.070926
